segments.en: “There are four things that no-one can guarantee—

segments.pli: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṃ.
segments.en: not an ascetic, a brahmin, a god, a Māra, a Brahmā, or anyone in the world.
No-one can guarantee that someone liable to grow old will not grow old.

segments.pli: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṃ;

segments.en: No-one can guarantee that someone liable to sickness will not get sick.

segments.pli: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṃ;

segments.en: No-one can guarantee that someone liable to death will not die.

segments.pli: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṃ;
‘yāni kho pana tāni pubbe attanā katāni pāpakāni kammāni saṅkilesikāni ponobhavikāni sadarāni dukkhavipākāni āyatiṃ jātijarāmaraṇikāni, tesaṃ vipāko mā nibbattī’ti natthi koci pāṭibhogo—
segments.en: No-one can guarantee that the bad deeds done in past lives—corrupted, leading to future lives, hurtful, resulting in suffering and future rebirth, old age, and death—will not produce their result.

segments.pli: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmiṃ.
Imesaṃ kho, bhikkhave, catunnaṃ dhammānaṃ natthi koci pāṭibhogo—
segments.en: These are the four things that no-one can guarantee—

segments.pli: samaṇo vā brāhmaṇo vā devo vā māro vā brahmā vā koci vā lokasmin”ti.
segments.en: not an ascetic, a brahmin, a god, a Māra, a Brahmā, or anyone in the world.”

sections.title: “There are four things that no-one can guarantee—

suttaplex.blurb: There are some things no-one can guarantee.
